meanings.definition: Constituting number twenty in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: The twentieth day of the month is my birthday.
meanings.sent2: She is the twentieth person in line to buy tickets.
meanings.sent3: The twentieth cookie in the jar always mysteriously disappears.
meanings.sent4: His twentieth attempt at solving the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The twentieth floor of the building offers a breathtaking view of the city.

meanings.definition: One of twenty equal parts of a whole.
meanings.sent1: She ate a twentieth of the cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: The twentieth of the month is payday for many employees.
meanings.sent3: The chef carefully cut the pizza into twentieths for the party.
meanings.sent4: His contribution was just a twentieth of the total effort.
meanings.sent5: Each student received a twentieth of the total candy in the jar.

meanings.sent1: Her birthday falls on the twentieth of December.
meanings.sent2: The twentieth in line gets the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent3: The cat always naps on the twentieth step of the staircase.
meanings.sent4: The twentieth chapter of the book reveals a surprising plot twist.
meanings.sent5: He marked his calendar for the twentieth of the month to pay bills.
